channel.title: Pages on fcu-Ansible
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on fcu-Ansible

item.title: Install
item.author: cyril.gratecos@gmail.com (Cyril Gratecos)
item.description: Dependencies Please take care theses dependencies are installed in your system python >= 2.7 virtualenv pip Install git clone https://github.com/delaballe/fcu-ansible.git cd fcu-ansible virtualenv . . ./bin/activate pip install -r requirement-pip cat <<'EOF' >> config/outscale.ini [default] region = <YOUR OUTSCALE API REGION> aws_access_key_id = <YOUR OUTSCALE API ACCESS KEY ID> aws_secret_access_key = <YOUR OUTSCALE API ACCESS KEY> EOF And voil√† !!! you’re ready to play provision & deploy in the Outscale Cloud Platform using Ansible.

item.title: About me
item.author: cyril.gratecos@gmail.com (Cyril Gratecos)
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
